method: 1. In a mixing bowl, whisk together the heavy cream, whole milk, sugar, and vanilla extract until the sugar is dissolved.
2. Pour the mixture into an ice cream maker and churn according to the manufacturer's instructions.
3. During the last few minutes of churning, add the chocolate chips and let them incorporate into the ice cream.
4. Once the ice cream has reached the desired consistency, transfer it to an airtight container and freeze for at least 4 hours or until firm.
5. Scoop the ice cream into bowls and enjoy your Bowl Marathon Ice Cream!
